Goodfellas.blurb: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

The Godfather.blurb: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Big Lebowski.blurb: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Casablanca.blurb: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

State of Grace.blurb: Terry Noonan returns home to New York's Hells Kitchen after a ten year absence. He soon hooks up with his old friends for a delightful romp.

The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo.blurb: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.
